motions.title: Motion to Defer RZ 21-03 to March 14 Meeting
motions.description: Motion to defer RZ 21-03 (600 Ashwood Parkway rezoning second read) to March 14 meeting to allow applicant time to consider and respond to Council's requests regarding pedestrian connectivity and entrances.

discussionItems.title: Contract Award for the Construction of Perimeter Center East Park
discussionItems.description: Price quotes for construction with Integrated Construction and Nobility submitting low bid of $2,564,220.33. Eric Johnson with Comprehensive Program Services bid $75,000 for program management. Nova Engineering unit price bid for geotechnical and testing. Total project $2,948,143 including 10% contingency, funded with ARPA funds.
